content.text: Anabeya Collection is a feature-rich, full-stack e-commerce web application built using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack and styled with Tailwind CSS. Designed for scalability and performance, the platform offers a seamless online shopping experience with an intuitive UI and optimized backend architecture.
This e-commerce platform comes equipped with essential and advanced features to enhance user experience and streamline store management.

items: Product Management – Admins can easily add, edit, and remove products with images, descriptions, and pricing details.
Shopping Cart & Checkout – Users can add products to their cart, update quantities, and proceed to a smooth checkout process.
Secure Authentication – Users can register and log in securely using JWT-based authentication.
Order Management – Customers can view their order history, and admins can update order statuses (processing, shipped, delivered).
Responsive Design – The platform is fully responsive, ensuring a smooth experience on both desktop and mobile devices.
Search & Filters – Users can easily find products using search functionality and category-based filters.
Real-Time Stock Updates – Inventory levels are updated dynamically as purchases are made.
SEO Optimization – The site is optimized for search engines to improve visibility and reach.

content.text: Anabeya Collection includes a powerful admin panel that enables store owners to efficiently manage their e-commerce operations. Admins have full control over products, orders, and customers.

items: Dashboard Overview – A clean dashboard providing insights into total orders, revenue, and customer activity.
Product Management – Admins can create, edit, and delete products with ease.
Order Processing – Orders can be tracked, updated, and marked as completed.
User Management – Admins can view customer details and manage user access.
Performance Analytics – Insights into sales, popular products, and customer trends.
Frontend: React.js with Tailwind CSS for a modern and responsive UI.
Backend: Node.js with Express.js for handling server-side logic.
Database: MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Authentication: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for secure user login and session management.
State Management: Context API for managing global state.
Deployment: Hosted on a scalable cloud platform for optimal performance.

content.text: Anabeya Collection is a robust e-commerce platform built for efficiency, security, and scalability. With an intuitive user experience, advanced admin panel, and seamless shopping flow, it provides everything needed for a successful online store. Whether you're a small business or an enterprise, this platform ensures a smooth digital shopping experience.
